name: Mastermind's Eye
summary: When you identify a creature with Recall Knowledge, that creature is flat-footed to you.
description:
When you succeed at identifying a creature using Recall Knowledge, that creature is flat-footed against your attacks until the start of your next turn; if you critically succeed, it's flat-footed against your attacks for 1 minute. This feat serves as the rogue's mastermind racket for the purpose of meeting prerequisites.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
